articles.title: Twitter to double engineering headcount in Singapore regional office by 2023 - CNA
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: Twitter intends to double its number of engineers at its engineering centre in Singapore - where its Asia Pacific headquarters is located - to more than 100 by next year, the social media giant announced on Tuesday (Jan 25). 

This investment, in…

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Bodies of twins found dead in canal cremated, father charged with murder - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): The family of the 11-year-old twins who were found dead in a canal in Upper Bukit Timah bade them an emotional farewell as they were cremated on Monday evening (Jan 24).

articles.title: Sam Kerr breaks Philippines resistance as Matildas reach Asian Cup last eight - The Guardian
articles.description: Australia maintained their perfect start to the Women’s Asian Cup, overcoming the Philippines 4-0 despite a goalless first half
